Package com.nokia.mid.sound

Provides an API for simple audio capabilities

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SoundListener Deprecated. As of Nokia UI API 1.1 in devices with MIDP 2.0 or higher, replaced by javax.microedition.media.PlayerListener interface.
 

Class Summary
Sound Deprecated. As of Nokia UI API 1.1 in devices with MIDP 2.0 or higher, replaced by classes in javax.microedition.media package.
 

Package com.nokia.mid.sound Description

Provides an API for simple audio capabilities.

Since:
1.0
